Hello!

I am selling a vps with the following specs:
<pre>
1GB RAM
1.2GB vSwap
4 vCPU Cores
30GB Disk space
1TB Bandwidth
1GBPS uplink
1x IPv4 address
OpenVZ/SolusVM
$19/Year
</pre>

It is prepaid until 25 January 2015, i want 10$ for the time that is left. It is hosted on [WeLoveServers](http://weloveservers.net)

It is currently in Kent, UK but you can move it to Buffalo, NY, Los Angeles, Dallas, Orlando if you want.
